channel.title: CVE Feed for wbcomdesigns -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wbcomdesigns -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-2108|2024-08-03T00:24:44.238Z -- wbcomdesigns -- wbcom%20designs%20%E2%80%93%20buddypress%20group%20reviews
item.description: The plugin Wbcom Designs – BuddyPress Group Reviews for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized settings changes and review modification due to missing capability checks and improper nonce checks in several functions related to said actions in versions up to, and including, 2.8.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify reviews and plugin settings on the affected site.

item.title: CVE-2024-5489|2024-08-01T21:11:12.790Z -- wbcomdesigns -- wbcom%20designs%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20font%20uploader
item.description: The Wbcom Designs – Custom Font Uploader plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'cfu_delete_customfont' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete any custom font.

item.title: CVE-2024-5489|2024-06-06T11:33:43.151Z -- wbcomdesigns -- wbcom%20designs%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20font%20uploader
item.description: The Wbcom Designs – Custom Font Uploader plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'cfu_delete_customfont' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete any custom font.

item.title: CVE-2024-5489|2024-07-17T15:48:41.659Z -- wbcomdesigns -- wbcom%20designs%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20font%20uploader
item.description: The Wbcom Designs – Custom Font Uploader plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'cfu_delete_customfont' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.4.
